title: I just logged into the client and got a gift from Riot
body:
I just logged in after being away for a few weeks and I got a gold notification saying I had a gift and it was Orianna from Riot Games. Can anyone tell me why they gifted me her? I don't remember what I did to get it.

Should I submit a ticket? Wasn't sure so I thought I would post on here.

replies.body: Ive had the same thing happen. I randomly received a chest and 2 icons. I have absolutely no clue why. And it wasnt a repeat notification. I just got gifted by riot after a game was over.

Per our current[ support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115002024567--Jan-26-Click-here-if-you-are-getting-notifications-about-receiving-gifts-in-the-updated-client-), toast notifications were enabled on the updated client.  Nothing new was handed out, but instead is a backlog of notifications for content you already received.  Just to confirm, I see you got Oriana back in January during the Snowdown event.  Let me know if that clears things up!
i don't think you should submit a ticket
Ok. Do you know any reason why I got this?
